name: HOLD IT IN
description:
As your family car drives through the hilly countryside, something stirs in your bowels.

Despite the pleas to your father, he gives one response...

HOLD IT IN.

Try to make it to the toilet stop without plastering the car with poop by keeping it inside you.

CONTROLS

Close Mouth = Up Arrow
Close Butt = Down Arrow
Only one can be closed at once.
